alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 01 at 1:33PM MST until January 02 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures in the upper 20s expected. * WHERE...Northwest Pinal County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
